page.description: A list of line properties with examples included:

case.title: Style
case.description: Sets the style of the line.

case.title: Line Width
case.description: Sets the thickness of the line.

case.title: Hide
case.description: Determines whether the line is visible.

case.title: Always on top
case.description: Determines whether the line will always be placed on top of other objects in the same location.

case.title: Left
case.description: Sets the horizontal position of the line.

case.title: Top
case.description: Sets the vertical position of the control.

case.title: Width
case.description: Sets the width of the control.

case.title: Height
case.description: Sets the height of the control.

case.title: Anchor
case.description: Determines the way the tabbed control will or will not stretch as the base form is resized. Possible attachment points are: 1 = top and right 2 = top, left, and right 4 = bottom and left 5 = bottom and right 6 = bottom, left, and right 8 = top, bottom, and left 9 = top, bottom, and right 10 = top, bottom, left, and right

case.title: Left
case.description: Sets the horizontal position of the control.

case.title: Top
case.description: Sets the vertical position of the control.

case.title: Width
case.description: Sets the width of the control.

case.title: Height
case.description: Sets the height of the control.

case.title: Anchor
case.description: Sets the stretch properties of the control and which sides of the form it will stick to.
